description: Defines the structure and content of the admin sidebar navigation menu. Each menu item can specify an icon, name, URL, and an array of roles required to view it.

sub.name: Reports
sub.roles: (inherits from parent or public if not set)

notes: Menu items without a 'roles' key will inherit roles from their parent or be considered publicly accessible if no parent roles are defined. Access to these URLs is now controlled by `AuthSourceMiddleware` in `routes.php`, allowing both MiniApp and XorAdmin authenticated users to access the same set of admin pages.
